'''Red Harbor''' is a harbor town on the [[Iron Islands]]. It serves as the main harbor for the region.<ref name="E15">"[[The Ghost of Harrenhal]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Lordsport is a major port in its own right. There is no mention of Red Harbor although the harbors of most of the other Iron Islands have not been named.
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===
[[Yara Greyjoy]] berths her fleet of thirty ships off Red Harbor because it is larger than [[Lordsport]].<ref name="E15"/>
